DC CODE ยง 32-708

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall maintain adequate records of declarations of domestic partnership, termination statements, and amendments to declarations of domestic partnership and termination statements.
The Mayor shall report annually to the Council on:
The number of domestic partnerships declared and terminated; and
Utilization of domestic partnership benefits by District government employees.
